entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Rain showers beginning this evening then changing to flurries near midnight. Snow level 2000 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
